meanings.sent1: The teacher dismissed the student's flubdub as unimportant chatter.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't understand a word he said; it was all flubdub to me.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's flubdub made the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her explanation was so full of flubdub that it left everyone confused.
meanings.sent5: The politician's flubdub was so ridiculous that it became a viral meme.

meanings.sent1: Don't listen to him; he's just a flubdub who enjoys confusing people.
meanings.sent2: She's known as the office flubdub because of her constant nonsensical stories.
meanings.sent3: The little boy proudly declared himself the king of the flubdubs.
meanings.sent4: In the land of make-believe, the flubdub ruled with his whimsical tales.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the flubdub in the group; he might lead you astray with his wild ideas.

meanings.sent1: He tends to flubdub when he's nervous and doesn't know what to say.
meanings.sent2: Please stop flubdubbing and get to the point of your story.
meanings.sent3: The parrot seemed to flubdub on purpose to entertain its owner.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was racing, causing her to flubdub during the important presentation.
meanings.sent5: The comedian intentionally flubdubbed to create a comedic effect on stage.
